'''''Vhaeraun's nightshield''''' was an [[abjuration]] [[spell]] contained in the ''[[Obsul Ssussun]]'' and associated with the [[drow]] god [[Vhaeraun]].
document_data.Effects: The spell created a protective aura that enhanced the physical resilience, reflexes, and willpower of the caster, and protected them from the ''[[magic missile]]'' spell in a manner similar to a ''[[brooch of shielding]]''.
document_data.Components: ''Vhaeraun's nightshield'' used verbal and somatic components, and the divine version also required a [[divine focus]] like a holy symbol.
